title: Having built up area exceeding 10,000 sq
clause_text: Having built up area exceeding 10,000 sq.m. or occupancy over the 1000 persons, used for the following occupancies which are vulnerable to man-made disasters based on the Risk Assessment Score as per Annexure-A

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
